name: The Crib+
description:
Just need a Cribbage board to play a quick round with a buddy?
The Crib+ is just the app for you!
This app provides a beautifully designed modified version of a cribbage board, optimized for all of your iOS devices.
Use this app to track a complete, multi-round game, including Skunking.
Support for 2 or 3 players
Multiple undos now available.
